Package com.kontakt.sdk.android.factory

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdvertisingPackage
    AdvertisingPackage provides parsed data from received Scan Record.
    Filter<T>
    Filters are introduced to provide more detailed search of BLE devices.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdvertisingDataController
    AdvertisingDataController extracts necessary data from propagated Beacon's advertising package frame and describes devices .
    Callbacks
    Factory producing scan callbacks with applied logic for interactions with Beacons.
    Callbacks.Configuration<T>
    Configuration needed to instantiate new Scan Callback.
    Callbacks.Configuration.Builder<T extends ManagerConfiguration>
    Configuration Builder.
    CallbacksL
    CallbacksL provides factory methods of Scan Callbacks.
    Filters
    Filters are designed to enable more detailed Beacons search.
    Filters.AddressFilter
    MAC Address filter.
    Filters.BeaconUniqueIdFilter
    Beacon unique id filter.
    Filters.CustomFilter
    Custom filter was designed to perform filtering specified by programmer.
    Filters.DeviceNameFilter
    Device Name filter.
    Filters.FirmwareFilter
    Firmware filter.
    Filters.MajorFilter
    Major filter.
    Filters.MinorFilter
    Minor filter.
    Filters.MultiFilter
    Multi Filter allows to specify several parameters to search specific Beacon.
    Filters.MultiFilter.Builder
    Multi filter Builder.
    Filters.ProximityUUIDFilter
    Proximity UUID filter.
    Runners
    Factory of Runnable objects.
    Runners.Configuration
    General configuration containing necessary components required to apply logic to the Runnable objects.
    Runners.Configuration.Builder
    Configuration Builder.
    RunnersL
    RunnersL class provides factory methods for monitoring and force scan.
    RunnersL.Configuration
    Runner Configuration.
    RunnersL.Configuration.Builder
    The type Builder.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Callbacks.CallbackType
    Callback type describes what kind of logic should be applied to Scan Callback.
    Runners.RunnerType
    Runner type indicates what type of runner should be produced.
